comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@jsoref**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: @KrisBash I think this was your demo. Please review these changes, in particular the path change in apache-demo.ps1.

comments.author: jsoref
comments.body: @mirichmo: if it's easier to accept without that change, it's fairly trivial for me to exclude it and leave it for later...

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @jsoref It might be easier to separate out the Apache demo changes, since the rest seem non-functional.

title: spelling fixes: demos
